* [Fort Deadlight](/fortDeadlight/): Sold by [No-Nut Ned](/noNutNed/).
* [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/): Sold by [Gyntel](/gyntel/) in [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/).
* [Kahanga Palace](/kahangaPalace/): On the table in [Prince Aruihi](/princeAruihi/)'s chambers.
* [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [The Hole](/theHole/): Sold by [Fyrna](/fyrna/).
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/): Sold by [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/).
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/): Sold by [Birna](/birna/).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): Looted from a chest in the eastern area.
